portfolio.description: I am a software engineer with a passion for building beautiful and functional web applications.

about.content: I am a software engineer with a passion for building beautiful and functional web applications. I have experience with a variety of technologies, including React, Node.js, and Python. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: I am currently working as a software engineer at Google, where I am responsible for developing and maintaining web applications.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: I worked as a software engineer intern at Facebook, where I gained experience with a variety of technologies, including React, Node.js, and Python.
